headline: Analog Devices Governance Move Puts Special Meeting Rights In Focus
summary: Analog Devices (NasdaqGS:ADI) has responded to a shareholder proposal seeking changes to special meeting rights. The company is urging investors to vote against the proposal and is pointing to prior changes that lowered the threshold for calling special meetings. Management is highlighting its broader governance approach, including a stated focus on shareholder rights and board accountability. Analog Devices, known for its analog and mixed signal semiconductors used in industrial,...

headline: Cisco's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y, Shares Fall
summary: CSCO beats Q2 estimates with 10% EPS growth and 9.7% revenue rise, but shares slide 7% despite strong AI orders and upbeat fiscal 2026 outlook.

headline: Here’s Why Analog Devices (ADI) Rose in Q4

headline: Barclays upgrades Analog Devices as industrial recovery takes shape
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays upgraded Analog Devices to Overweight in a note Thursday, arguing the company is best positioned to benefit from an improving industrial backdrop and carries “the cleanest operating model and balance sheet” in the group.

raw.headline: Barclays upgrades Analog Devices as industrial recovery takes shape

headline: Unveiling Analog Devices (ADI) Q1 Outlook: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Beyond analysts' top-and-bottom-line estimates for Analog Devices (ADI), evaluate projections for some of its key metrics to gain a better insight into how the business might have performed for the quarter ended January 2026.
